key_lessons: Don't bet on tight timelines from vague announcements
Review exit criteria - was the thesis still valid?
Consider using stop-losses with trailing profit

trade_analyses.question: GPT ads by January 31?
trade_analyses.reason: OpenAI announced ads testing 'in coming weeks' - Jan 31 is 3 days away, market seems mispriced
lessons: Don't bet on tight timelines from vague announcements
